snippet.title: Project Borealis: Prologue - Teaser Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Project Borealis: Prologue

Return to the snow-covered streets of Ravenholm in this reimagined continuation of the beloved Half-Life saga. Project Borealis: Prologue is a fan-made gaming experience set before the events of Project Borealis.

Fall 2024
----
